name: Quadratic Equations Test 5
description: Practice Quadratic Equation Questions Online Test 5

questions.name:
I. x^2 – 9x + 18 = 0
II. y^2 – 11y + 18 = 0
questions.explanation:
According to the given equations:
I. x^2 – 9x + 18 = 0
x^2 – 3x – 6x + 18 = 0
x (x – 3) – 6 (x – 3) = 0
(x – 3)(x – 6) = 0
x = 3, 6
II. y^2 – 11y + 18 = 0
y^2 – 9y – 2y + 18 = 0
y(y – 9) – 2(y – 9) = 0
(y – 2) (y – 9) = 0
y = 2, 9
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is x = y or no relation is obtained.

options.name: if x = y or relationship between x and y can't be established

questions.name:
I. x = 152 – 63
II. y = 122 – 112 – 14
questions.explanation:
According to the given equations:
I. x = 152 – 63
x = 225 – 216
x = 9
II. y = 122 – 112 – 14
y = 144 – 121 – 14
y = 9
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is x=y or no relation is obtained

options.name: if x = y or relationship between x and y can't be established

questions.name:
I. x^2 – 14x + 48 = 0
II. y^2 – 9y + 20 = 0
questions.explanation:
According to the given equations:
I. x^2 – 14x + 48 = 0
x^2 – 8x – 6x + 48 = 0
x (x – 8) – 6 (x – 8) = 0
(x – 8)(x – 6) = 0
x = 8, 6
II. y^2 – 9y + 20 = 0
y^2 – 5y – 4y + 20 = 0
y (y – 5) – 4 (y – 5) = 0
(y – 4)(y – 5) = 0
y = 4, 5
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is x > y
Hence, option A is correct.

questions.name:
I. 6x + y = 25
II. 2x + 3y = 27
questions.explanation:
Correct Option: D
According to the given equations:
I. 6x + y = 25
y = 25 – 6x
II. 2x + 3y = 27
2x + 3(25 – 6x) = 27
2x + 75 – 18x = 27
75 – 27 = 18x – 2x
48 = 16x
x = 3
y = 25 – 6x
y = 25 – 18 = 7
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is x < y

questions.name:
I. 4x + 3y = 51
II. x + 4y = 29
questions.explanation:
Correct Option: A
According to the given equations:
I. 4x + 3y = 51
3y = 51 – 4x
y = (51 – 4x)/3
II. x + 4y = 29
x + 4 × (51 – 4x)/3 = 29
3x + 204 – 16x = 87
204 – 87 = 16x – 3x
13x = 117
x = 9
y = (51 – 4x)/3 = (51 – 36)/3 = 15/3 = 5
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is x > y

questions.name:
I. (x^9/4 ÷ 9)2 = 27 ÷ x^5/2
II. y^1/4 × y^3/4 × 2401 = 49 × y^3
questions.explanation:
According to the given equations:
I. (x^9/4 ÷ 9)^2 = 27 ÷ x^5/2
x9/2/81 = 27/x^5/2
x^9/2 × x^5/2 = 81 × 27
x7 = 3^4 × 3^3
x = 3
II. y^1/4 × y^3/4 × 2401 = 49 × y
y × 2401 = 49 × y^3
2401/49 = y^2
y = ± 7
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion
Option D is correct.

options.name: if x = y or relationship between x and y can't be established

questions.name:
I. x^2 – (729)1/6 x – 4 = 0
II. y^2 – 8y + 16 = 0
questions.explanation:
Correct Option: B
According to the given equations :
I. x^2 – (729)1/6 x – 4 = 0
x^2 – 3x – 4 = 0
x^2 – 4x + x – 4 = 0
x(x – 4) + 1 (x – 4) = 0
x = – 1, 4
II. y^2 – 8y + 16 = 0
y^2 – 4y – 4y + 16 = 0
y (y – 4) – 4 (y – 4) = 0
y = 4, 4
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is, x ≤ y

questions.name:
I. x^3 – 9x^2 + 8x = 0
II. y^3 + 7y^2 + 12y = 0
questions.explanation:
According to the given equations :
I. x^3 – 9x^2 + 8x = 0
(x^3 – 9x^2 + 8x)/x = 0/x
x2 – 9x + 8 = 0
x2 – 8x – x + 8 = 0
x (x – 8) –1(x – 8) = 0
(x – 1) (x – 8) = 0
x = 0, 1, 8
II. y^3 + 7y^2 + 12y = 0
(y^3 + 7y^2 + 12y)/y = 0/y
y2 + 7y + 12 = 0
y^2 + 4y + 3y + 12 = 0
y(y + 4) + 3 (y + 4) = 0
(y + 3) (y + 4) = 0y = 0, – 3, – 4
Therefore, x ≥ y
Hence, option C is correct.

questions.name:
I. 2x^4 – 36x^2 + 162 = 0
II. 3y^4 – 75y^2 + 432 = 0
questions.explanation:
I. 2x^4 – 36x^2 + 162 = 0
x^4 – 18x^2 + 81 = 0
x^4 – 9x^2 – 9x^2 + 81 = 0
x^2 (x^2 – 9) – 9(x^2 – 9) = 0
(x^2 – 9) (x^2 – 9) = 0
x^2 = 9 ; x = ± 3
II. 3y^4 – 75y^2 + 432 = 0
y4 – 25y2 + 144 = 0
y^4 – 16y^2 – 9y^2 + 144 = 0
y^2 (y^2 – 16) – 9 (y^2 – 16) = 0
(y^2 – 9) (y^2 – 16) = 0
y^2 = 9; y^2 = 16
y = ± 3, y = ± 4
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is, x = y or no relation is obtained
Hence, option D is correct.

options.name: if x = y or relationship between x and y can't be established

questions.name:
I. x^2 + (√7x)^2 + 12 = 0
II. y^2 + 3y – (√4)^2 = 0
questions.explanation:
According to the given equations :
I. x^2 +(√7x)^2 + 12 = 0
x^2 + 7x + 12 = 0
x^2 + 3x + 4x + 12 = 0
x (x + 3) + 4 (x + 3) = 0
(x + 4) (x + 3) = 0
x = – 3,– 4
II. y^2 + 3y –(√4)^2 = 0
y^2 + 3y – 4 = 0
y^2 + 4y – y – 4 = 0
y(y + 4) – 1(y + 4) = 0
(y – 1) (y + 4) = 0
y = 1, – 4
After comparison of both equations, the conclusion is, x = y or no relation is obtained
Hence, option D is correct.
